headline: Vistra Corp. (VST) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to Vistra (VST). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.

headline: Vistra (VST): Exploring Current Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Vistra (VST) has drawn some attention lately thanks to recent moves in its stock price. Over the past month, the stock has seen a 14% slide, prompting investors to look more closely at what is driving this shift. See our latest analysis for Vistra. While Vistra’s share price has pulled back sharply in recent weeks, it is worth remembering the stock still boasts a year-to-date share price return of over 14% and a staggering five-year total shareholder return of more than 900%.
